title: Pixel 4A 5G keeps asking to be restarted to "complete install" each morning after android 11 update
content:
I received my new pixel 4A %G out the box and completed setup including Android 11 update- Since the last few days each morning , it is asking me to "restart to complete installation" been 3 days now - I keep restarting but it is the same the next day ??

How can I finish the installation and why does it keep coming up ?

Thanks
